text: 2|284|On ci dar osmonho va zamin ast, az oni Alloh taolo ast. Agar on ciro dar dili xud dored, oskor kuned jo pinhonas namoed, Alloh taolo sumoro ʙar [asosi] on muhosiʙa [ʙozpursi] mekunad; pas, [ʙar asosi ʙaxsis va rahmati xes] har kiro ʙixohad, meʙaxsad va [az ruji adolat va hikmatas niz] har kiro ʙixohad, azoʙ mekunad; va Alloh taolo ʙar [ancomi] har kore tavonost
